sys_script.description: Sets the country based on the core_country value if available.
sys_script.name: Airdrome - Set country

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_c4cbc3f1db3ac510bcced03cd3961923
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>x_snc_airline_airdrome</collection> <condition/> <description>Sets the country based on the core_country value if available.</description> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Airdrome - Set country</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
if (x_snc_devtools.IsValidSysId(current.core_country)) { current.country = current.core_country.name; } else { current.country = ''; }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-12 13:55:18</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>c4cbc3f1db3ac510bcced03cd3961923</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Airdrome - Set country</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Airline WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_airline">54ee8da3dbd64110b652edb305961973</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Airline WORK IN PROGRESS">54ee8da3dbd64110b652edb305961973</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_c4cbc3f1db3ac510bcced03cd3961923</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 13:55:18</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> <x_snc_datasilos_created>false</x_snc_datasilos_created> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c4cbc3f1db3ac510bcced03cd3961923"/> </record_update>
